column1: Ahhh...so you don’t remember... HA HA HA!
That doesn't matter (hehe)... the town is in desperate need of your help...
The town hall is infested with disgruntled ghouls and the people of Florin needs you to rid the town of the ghosts!!
BEWARE however (hehe)... some ghosts will not be easy to negotiate and you must calm them first...
I’ll send Whiskers to show you the ropes; he’ll teach everything you need to know.
It's too busy to start right now come back after lunch and Whiskers will give you the key to the town hall.
